dataRoles.name: signMeasure
dataRoles.description: Dynamic signage/account type measure. Assign Values -1, +1 and 0 for negative, positive and result/total rows respectively. Not applicable when Columns field is used.

dataRoles.name: others
dataRoles.description: Assign non-categorical items such as web and image URLs

licenseKey.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://inforiver.com

offlineLicenseKey.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://inforiver.com

appSourceLicence.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://inforiver.com

rowSubtotals.description: Show subtotals for all row groups

absoluteSort.description: Sorts the members based on the magnitude of the values by ignoring the signage

signSort.description: Sorts the members based on the magnitude of the values

absoluteSearch.description: Search Numbers by magnitude and with precision (Raw Unformatted Numbers) irrespective of sign (+/-) and rounding

prefixNullWithUnit.displayName: Should display Prefix as Unit for null values

showPercentageSymbol.description: Show Percentage Symbol(%) for Relative Variances

unitsSentenceCase.description: Units Upper and Lower Case Text

showScalingUnit.description: Show unit in DataLabel & Tooltip. Use this when you have values of same units.

ibcsformat.description: IBCS Number Format - Variances are signed. Actuals are unsigned.

noOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

dlIBCSNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

negativeValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Negative values

positiveValueFormat.description: Select the number format for Positive values

rowSubtotals.description: Show Subtotals for all row levels

columnSubtotals.description: Show Subtotals for all column groups
